values:
Rebekah made my day today. good job. she made a parting statement she didn't have too, but she did anyway. which made it even better.

<3
Matt
i love you, victoria leigh montgomery.

Not to sound unsympathetic, but i don't get why people let things make them sad. When something's wrong, they don't do anything about it. If something's making you sad and you can make a change, then i suggest the change.

I understand it's impossible with a good bit of the situations. But the ones where it isn't people still won't do anything to make things better. Change something, atleast do it for your own health.

Again...i'm not trying to be insensitive, just making an attempt at being logical and realistic about it.

<3
Matt

and finally, i am completely happy. you do this.

<3
Matt

Something/someone recently has made me change a few bad habits of mine. Or work on them atleast. And they also have made me worry less than i normally do, and be a lot more positive than i normally am. I hope this continues.

<3
Matt

Don't get offended, but i've noticed all the girls i've been involved with are the same, minus Tori. Not that every single girl in the world is the same, but maybe i need to quit looking, not give up. But to quit worrying so damn much.
I've fought to be with people a few times, i've fought hard and i've fought well. No one's ever done that for me though, maybe the one meant to be my wife one day will do such.

Also, i want to grow a beard. Damn.

<3
Matt

So i let a lot of things be known to the person i should've told all along.

Some of it seems mutual.

And quite surprising. One of those "well you never asked, it never came up" things for us both.

I'm wondering if it all means something. Show me, show me.

<3
Matt

it's not going to be alright.
and it's not going to be "okay".

<3
Matt

Thanks for helping make my life even more complicated. i wasted way too much time with you, i wasted much more that goes beyond just time.

Not only that, but because of you, you made me waste the time of others. time and other things i will NEVER get back.

For this i hate you. A word i rarely use in my vocabulary.

Thanks for teaching me a lesson.

And thanks for getting me so depressed that i can't even get depressed over girls anymore.

<3
Matt

The telephone swallowed the child. This is the last time I say your name. The crackle and hiss from the walls. You smile like a catholic in heat. Just don't forget what you've done. Just don't forget. This is the last time that I say your name. Forget the fuck away from me. The child is sleeping under the wires. - The Bled i feel relieved. <3 Matt

life has these points where it doesn't work out like you had planned.

it's not uncommon.

but sometimes it's a lot worse and a lot more obvious.

<3
Matt

tonight was amazing.

but that was one hell of a lonely walk back to my car. and it hasn't been such for quite a while.

<3
Matt

um...
      
the locust is love

I'd like to thank my friends for saving my life every single day. I love you guys, til the end.

<3
Matt

She's beautiful. Inside and out.

<3
Matt

Don't get your hopes up, kids.

<3
Matt

She's amazing, honestly.

Ike, Amber, and I watched What Dreams May Come last night. That movie is beautiful.

It caused me to do a lot of thinking. Good kind.

Seeing Ike and Amber so happy made me as happy, made me realize i take certain things for granted.

<3
Matt

Getting the shit kicked out of me. People falling on my head. All worth the performance, and worth going through to hang-out with tori, something i miss doing.

Ike and Amber were driving me up there. Liz for going as well.

Ryan Wilson for the hug haha

Thanks to Lia, Sarah, and their friend for helping us with the ticket/line situation.

Tori for just actually seeming to want to hang out with me.

Jordan for having my back during Norma Jean when i kept getting nailed.

I love you alllllll.

<3
Matt

tonight was amazing.

utterly amazing.

she is amazing.

<3
Matt
all in all. i guess i deserve it. <3 Matt

you'll always remain the most beautiful girl in the world to me. not matter what. <3 Matt Two roads...Split off from here, and my life goes running in opposite directions. Exaggerating the barrier between who I am, and who I want to be. I wanted to be that breath of fresh air, When everything smelled so insincere. But this taste still lingers in my mouth, Deceit has ways of sticking around. And I'm ready to disappear, Vacation seems far...From here. Note to self: I miss you terribly. This is what...We call a tragedy. Come back to me, Come back to me, To me. Note to self: I miss you terribly. This is what...We call a tragedy. Come back to me, Back to me, To me. I can feel my mind, wandering again. Into where I dont know, and will I ever get home? Time starts moving, faster than I can. And I'm sick of this scene, I need to break the routine. I can feel my mind, wandering again. Into where I dont know, and will I ever get home? Time starts moving, faster than I can. And I'm sick of this scene, I need to break the routine. Two roads...Split off from here, and my life goes running in opposite directions. Exaggerating the barrier between who I am, and who I want to be. Which part of me is lost? I feel so close, and yet I am so far. Which part of me is lost? I feel so close, and yet I am so far.

I came to the conclusion the situation spoken of earlier was doing more damage than good. So i'm done. I refuse to deal with it anymore. It all turned out to just be fabricated. It has taught me to take what people say less seriously.

<3
Matt



"
i want to take the bullet,
the one aimed straight for your heart,
i want to meet the wolves halfway,
and let them tear me apart.
but that's not the way they do it here.

i want to lay on the tracks,
feel hot steel screaming at me,
expose the bones on my back,
let me show you what i mean.
yeah its a different kind of love,
i want to climb barbed wire fences
and warm our hands in blood.

and this is my gift,
is asking you to fix
my ruined hands.
and its a gift that keeps on giving,
and its a gift that keeps on giving,
and its a gift that keeps on giving,
and right now its all i have to give.

i want to lay on the tracks,
feel hot steel screaming at me,
expose the bones on my back,
let me show you what i mean
i want to lay on the tracks,
feel hot steel screaming at me,
expose the bones on my back,
let me show you what i mean

i want to write the perfect song,
and play it just for you,
while you are tangled up in sleep.
i need you more than ill ever know
until i stop breathing
my lungs will take you for granted."

It's good i guess that while dealing with my own personal problems. i can still help my friends and be fully there and help. but they know i'm there no matter what.

Lately, a situation occured, and a choice was made. it wasn't the choice i wanted, but i ended up satisfied anyway. if you're curious just ask i guess.

But despite the decision, things are better off that way.

Thanks for reading.





M, 4, V, T, C and H

Make eye contact so you know I care
You know I care
But only as a guest
Such an unfaithful bride draped in dress
Spun with threads of my regret

"Fuck Osama Bin Laden, Alqueda, and backward-ass, cave-dwelling, fundamentalist assholes everywhere. On the names of innocent thousands murdered, I pray you spend the rest of eternity with your seventy-two whores roasting in a jet-fueled fire in hell. You towel headed camel jockeys can kiss my royal, Irish ass!" - Edward Norton, The 25th Hour.

Each conversation seems to become the best i've ever had. I can't think of a better way to out it than that, Ike's good at this stuff, maybe he can help me. For once i'm not thinking what i'm feeling, and that's a really good sign i'd say. I don't think i've ever heard a more infectious voice or laugh. 

< 3
<3
Matt

i think i just got in over my head.

<3

I've decided tonight I'm staying alive just kicking and screaming blood boiling and streaming There are things far too dark to comprehend Sleep on it one more night my sad old friend Doo do Doo do Doo do The worst is over.

I need to quit acting like a child. I need to learn how to express being corcerned without being angry.

But sometimes it's hard. It's like my mind tells me there's only one way to do things. It's just that i'm afraid of becoming a shadow to the people i care about.

<3
Matt

It seems lately, the key answers to life seem to be the times when i realize i do not know anything. when it all comes down to it, i do not know shit.

A select few lately have proved to me what it is to be brave, to truelly have courage, specifically in the last week or two. It has made me realize they're more than me, that they're handling things i'd completely lose it over, if it happened to me.
<3
Matt

I'm sorry. To anyone who lost someone in that car tonight. I really am.

<3
Matt

I'll pick up everything you left behind Cross your fingers, and pray for winter I'll be there Painting the town your favorite color. So i went to Carrollton with my best friend, Jordan, today. We did this to see Tracy. Which was fun, met two of her friends. Played trivia at this local pizza place and kicked ass at it and then had to leave early. Tracy's friends are pretty fucking awesome.

One the way back, Jordan and i ended up on Highway 18 instead of 16. and ended up in Greenville. We called my dad and he gave us directions. But it came down to me and jordan. Our minds together can kick your ass at your local resteraunt's trivia and getting home safe.

<3
Matt

(Note: Jordan, lead guitarist in our band The Veil, his mom's friend used to do bible study with Daniel. W, the lead singer for Zao. that's wicked shit.)

For the record. I became an uncle today at 12:34 to Brandon McCrae C. ___________________________________________________________ I wrote this for a baby Who has yet to be born My brother's first child I hope that womb's not too warm Cause it's cold out here And it'll be quite a shock To breathe this air To discover loss So I'd like to make some changes Before you arive So when your new eyes meet mine They won't see no lies Just love. Just love. I will be pure No, no, I know i will be pure Like snow, like gold

Now for new pics.

I want so badly to believe that "there is truth, that love is real" And I want life in every word to the extent that it's absurd I greased the lens and framed the shot using a friend as my stand-in The script it called for rain but it was clear that day so we faked it The marker snapped and I yelled "quiet on the set" And then called "action!" And I kissed you in a style that clark gable would have admired (I thought it classic) <3 Matt

you're too good for me, love.

and i'm a fuck.

<3
Matt

She knows who she be. If it makes you less sad, I will die by your hand. I hope you find out what you want. I already know what I am. And if it makes you less sad, we'll start talking again. And you can tell me how vile I already know that I am. I'll grow old and start acting my age. I'll be a brand new day in a life that you hate. A crown of gold. A heart that's harder than stone. And it hurts a whole lot, but it's missed when it's gone. Call me a safe bet. I'm betting I'm not. I'm glad that you can forgive. I'm only hoping as time goes, you can forget. If it makes you less sad, I'll move out of the state. You can keep to yourself. I'll keep out of your way. And if it makes you less sad, I'll take your pictures all down. Every picture you paint, I will paint myself out. It's cold as a tomb, and it's dark in your room, when I sneak to your bed to pour salt in your wounds. So call it quits or get a grip. Say you wanted a solution. You just wanted to be missed. Call me a safe bet. I'm betting I'm not. I'm glad that you can forgive. I'm only hoping as time goes, you can forget... You are calm and reposed. Let your beauty unfold. Pale white, like the skin stretched over your bones. Spring keeps you ever close. You are second hand smoke. You are so fragile and thin. Standing trial for your sins. Holding onto yourself the best you can. You are the smell before rain. You are the blood in my veins. Call me a safe bet. I'm betting I'm not. I'm glad that you can forgive. I'm only hoping as time goes, you can forget. Have a nice day, kids. <3 Matt
